title: S.m.u.r.f  mode?
body: Super Mega Ultra Rapid Fire mode? I could see this as a new urf mode.

replies.body: I think there was a reverse URF mode joked at a while back, with like 5 minute cooldowns and everyone would move at like 50 units from the start, named smurf mode or something
Yeah that sounds familiar, probably that then.

Yeh, it was NURF. That was a mode I was interested in playing but Rito decided to be a b!tch about it and not even give us a few hours with it.

{{item:3070}} I cry... {{item:3070}}
I think they should still bring it back and have it on the PBE for a bit to test and see if people like it, I personally would try it out once for the lols
To be fair, a game type like that would take an hour just to hit level 6, so you'd only get 1 game in a few hours XD
Plot twist: You can only play it on a fully levelled smurf account.
